alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Lafayette; Lee; Pontotoc; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 9:26PM CDT until June 11 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LAFAYETTE...CHICKASAW...EAST CENTRAL YALOBUSHA... CALHOUN...SOUTHERN PONTOTOC AND SOUTHWESTERN LEE COUNTIES... At 926 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Bruce, or 15 miles northwest of Houston, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pontotoc, Houston, Verona, Bruce, Vardaman, Derma, Pittsboro, Pyland, Randolph, Banner, Troy, Tula, Houlka, Paris, New Houlka, Algoma, Toccopola, Woodland, Robbs and Thorn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Chickasaw; Lafayette; Lee; Pontotoc; Yalobusha
